data.description: Eminem watched his daughter, Hailie, get crowned homecoming queen from an empty classroom in the school because he didnt want to take the attention away from her.
Dogs look at owners while they poop because they know they are vulnerable and want you to warn/protect them if there is trouble!

Mark Zuckerberg Will Only Eat Meat He Kills Himself
Submitted by: Brian
84% of American vegetarians and vegans, abandon their diet, returning back to meat in under a year.
In 2013 Kanye Wests Yeezus was voted both Most Overrated Album and Most Underrated Album by Pitchfork readers.

The NAVY drew a penis via skywriting. (video)
Submitted by: Brian
Rob Gronkowski lives off of his endorsement money and hasnt spent a dime of his NFL Contract
A Swedish man survived for two months in a car that had been snowed over. He ate only snow, and survived due the igloo effect.
Scooby Doos real name is Scoobert Doo.
Most people who have cars with built in GPS use their phones for directions.
The 6th biggest Pyramid in the world was built in 1991 and is a BassPro Shops Megastore.

There are 2 ATMs in Antarctica and only one of them works at a time. The reason for this is so if the working one breaks down, the other can be cannibalized for parts. A repairman also stops by every 2 years to perform routine maintenance.
The voice of AOL (the guy who said Youve Got Mail!) was only ever paid $200.00 for his work and gets zero residuals or royalties. He now drives for Uber. (video)

There is a system where cows can choose when they are milked. The whole process is automated, customized for each cow, and has seen cows living 30% longer than those at farms that use traditional methods. (video)
Texas, New York and California all have economies bigger than Russias.
Anthony Hopkins was diagnosed with Aspergers Syndrome (a form of autism).
Australia was once home to a flightless bird known as the Demon-Duck of Doom.
In 2005, serial killer Dennis Rader was caught because he sent a floppy disk to the police instead of a handwritten note.
Half of academic papers are never read by anyone other than their authors, peer reviewers, and journal editors.
Donkey Xote, an Spanish-Italian knockoff of the Shrek films released in 2007 promoted its DVD with a caption legitimately reading From the producers who SAW Shrek.
Owls make almost no noise from flying, even when tested in a room with multiple microphones. (video)

Harvard professor Tom Lehrer was asked at the age of 84 by rapper 2 Chainz if he could sample his 60-year old song. Lehrer replied, I grant you motherfuckers permission to do this. Please give my regards to Mr. Chainz, or may I call him 2?
James Cameron was supposed to make a Spider Man film in the 1990s with Leonardo DiCaprio as Spider Man & Arnold Schwarzenegger as Doctor Octopus
Cruise ships emissions can equal the equivalent of one million cars per day and air quality on deck can be worse than in the worlds most polluted cities.
Sean Connery single handedly beat 4 men in a night club while Michael Caine held his coat.
Awesome is be the most overused word in the English language.
When bitten by a coral snake, a Texas man killed the snake by biting off the snakes head and using the decapitated body as a tourniquet.
Earth is the only known planet where fire can burn. No other planet has enough oxygen.
Wilmer Valderrama purchased the Vista Cruiser used on That 70s Show for $500 when the series ended.

There is a fixed set of taxi drivers in New York, and it costed over 1 million dollars to buy a license as recent as 2014. Thanks to companies like uber however these licenses currently cost under $200,000 each.
When Sir Terry Pratchett was knighted, he forged his own sword from iron and meteorites just for the occasion.
Antler growth tissue if surgically removed and grafted to another part of the deers body, an antler will grow there.
The Halloween film Hocus Pocus was a critical and commercial failure upon release. It became a cult classic after yearly airings on the family channel.
The bald eagle hasnt been considered an endangered species since 2007
When Eminem was sued in 2003 by the bully, DeAngelo Bailey for slandering him in the song Brain Damage, the judge threw out the case and provided the ruling by rapping it.
Tom Petty escaped death as well as saved his wife and 5 year old daughter when an arsonist tried to set his house on fire. He later wrote I Wont Back Down which was inspired by the experience.
Americas first female mayor was elected in 1887. A group of men nominated her as a joke intended to humiliate women, but instead she won over 60% of the vote.

When Daft Punk recorded an interview with Giorgio Moroder (godfather of electronic music) for their song Giorgio by Moroder, they used microphones from 60s to 00s, so when he spoke of a period in his life, it would be recorded with a microphone...
Dolphins milk is as thick as toothpaste.
